name: two kids died in the blue lake -- eat, dish, myth
description:
This is one of my "eat, dish, myth" projects. In this experimental project I try to explore discourses about images, digital culture, food myths and memories of disasters. I "cooked" this menu with the Montage method using pictures of fancy food from the internet that I downloaded without permission – mostly from Michellin star food – to present a metaphor about the landscape of environmental disasters caused by the oligarchic corporations in Indonesia, some disasters have not even been resolved until now , such as the Lapindo Mud tragedy, Karawang oil leak, forest fires in East Kalimantan etc., there are 10 series in this project and will continue, I try to imagine what if an image of food that has a certain personal memory and is distributed to public spaces every day has a collective memory about environmental disasters and the failure of capitalism in managing the environment. This is a series with the title "two kids died in the blue lake" is a food metaphor about one of the many ex-mining holes that were not closed by a mining company and then drowned two small children in Kalimantan.
Bon Appetit!
